CustomField.description: Specify the amount of the related Credit Memo Line Item's Total to use to create this Invoice Line Item's Total. The Total will be used to back-calculate the Tax and Subtotal.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Specify the amount of the related Credit Memo Line Item's Total to use to create this Invoice Line Item's Total. The Total will be used to back-calculate the Tax and Subtotal.
CustomField.label: Amount To Apply
